price: 30. "En O, mijn volk! Wie zal mij tegen Allah helpen, als ik hen zou uitdrijven? Zullen jullie dan niet nadenken?
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi man yanṣurunī mina al-lahi in ṭaradttuhum afalā tadhakkarūna
